post.body: is stealing bandwith from his sons - his illegal dl'ing is more important than their gaming.
A day's work on a 60 bar dance break that will pass in about 60 seconds. A floating dialation of time.
is in a perpetual state of diminishing doubt.
is proceeding into the depths. The ooze is warm.
will be preparing a nice seafood gumbo tonight - known to some as a treyf stew.
finds himself reduced to serving up straight lines for humorous bass players.
is trying to think of something witty to say - but the only thing coming out is notes, gas, fear and desire.
is finding the weight of festivities heavy on his eyelids.
is finding Facebook just like Times Square - cheerful, bland and boring. He misses the old grit and gristle.
We went into theater to get laid and hear good stories. We stayed in theater to tell good stories including ones about how we thought we'd g
"The world seldom changes / but the wet foot dangles / until a bird arranges / two notes at right angles." Elizabeth Bishop.
seems to be living in a dorm suddenly. Fudge, drugs and work (no sex.)
chilly on the Vineyard.
People from Hawaii and Alaska running for office!! The attack of the non-contiguous!!
preparing to spend a month working on Martha's Vineyard. Not bad!
wishes his parents were alive to see this convention.
1/4 of the way thru 1/2 of his goals for the first 3/5 of his life. .
happy to be fractionally awarded.
looking for rose colored glasses and a train ticket to the 60's.
discovering he has a jingle to write.
